Immerse Yourself in Parisian Elegance: The Ultimate Fashion Show Experience

Step into a world where haute couture comes to life on the runways of Paris. Imagine being front-row at the most exclusive fashion shows, where the latest collections from iconic designers are unveiled before your eyes. Experience the thrill of private backstage tours, meet-and-greets with fashion legends, and access to after-parties that are the talk of the town. This is more than just a fashion show; it’s a journey into the heart of Parisian luxury.

PLAN WITH US NOW
TALK TO A TRAVEL EXPERT

Paris, the fashion capital of the world, beckons you to indulge in an experience that is both timeless and avant-garde. Feel the excitement build as you arrive at the venue, a historic landmark transformed into a playground for the world’s most influential designers. The lights dim, the music swells, and the first model steps onto the runway—each outfit a masterpiece, each detail a testament to the craftsmanship and creativity that define Parisian fashion. But the experience doesn’t end there. With Forest Travel, you’re not just an observer; you’re a participant in the world of high fashion. Enjoy private fittings with top designers, where you’ll receive personalized style consultations that reflect your unique taste and personality. Savor gourmet dining experiences curated to complement the elegance of the evening, and unwind in five-star accommodations that offer a sanctuary of luxury after a day filled with fashion and flair. Every moment is designed to immerse you in the sophisticated charm of Paris, leaving you with memories as chic as the city itself.

The Allure of Parisian Fashion: A Journey Through Style and Sophistication

Exclusive Fashion Week Packages: Tailored to Perfection

For the fashion aficionado, our luxury packages offer unparalleled access to Paris Fashion Week. Choose the Couture Experience for front-row seats, backstage access, and private fittings with top designers. Opt for the Ultimate Glamour Package, which includes VIP access to after-parties, meet-and-greets with fashion icons, and a personal stylist to guide you through your Parisian adventure. Each package is crafted to ensure that your experience is as exclusive as it is unforgettable. Ready to step into the world of Parisian fashion? Let us take you there.

Considerations for Planning Your Trip

When planning your trip with Forest Travel, keep these important points in mind to make sure everything goes smoothly and your expectations are clear.

  • Minimum budget $3,000 PP

    Our luxury travel services typically require a minimum investment of around $3,000 per person. Please note that this amount is for a short trip. If your trip lasts longer than four days, it’s a good idea to adjust your budget accordingly. Keep in mind that as flight duration increases, ticket prices may also go up.

  • Reservation period 10 Days

    We prioritize your travel requirements. As a luxury agency, our goal is to create memorable journeys. We kindly request a minimum of 10 days for trip planning. Reservations can be made up to one year in advance, but travel arrangements beyond that period cannot be accommodated due to rate unavailability.

  • Properties $800 Per Night

    We provide a thoughtfully chosen selection of more than 2,000 luxury hotels, private properties, cruise lines, and tour operators. Our rates typically range from $800 to $1,000 per room per night. As a Virtuoso agency, we guarantee room upgrades and special benefits.

  • Activities and Must-Haves

    We are a luxury travel agency with a team of experts committed to improving your travel journey. If you desire extraordinary experiences, VIP access, private aircraft, exclusive accommodations, or top-tier services, we are ready to assist you. Just communicate your wishes or requirements to your travel advisor, and we will strive to turn them into reality.

At Forest Travel Luxury Agency, enjoy a complimentary room upgrade upon arrival, enhancing your stay with added comfort and elegance, subject to availability. Additionally, benefit from early check-in and late checkout, along with complimentary Wi-Fi to stay connected effortlessly.

Forest Travel offers luxury packages that elevate your travel experience with a minimum of $100 in value-added amenities. Enjoy personalized welcome gifts, complimentary spa treatments, gourmet dining, and private guided tours, all designed to ensure your adventure is unforgettable.
